name: The Yeti Siege
description:
A short arcade-like experience where you have to defend your castle from a yeti siege. Made for the Lost cartridge game jam 3 based on the Atari 2600 system.

How to play:

Press space to spawn your character at the start and when you die. Move around with WASD. press space to spawn basic units and arrow keys to spawn more advanced units. Units require fuel. Don't touch the monsters and don't let them get to your castle.
